properties.name: spotify.client-id
properties.description: clientId of app from Spotify Dashboard.

properties.name: spotify.client-secret
properties.description: clientSecret of app from Spotify Dashboard.

properties.name: spotify.redirect-uri
properties.description: URL that Spotify redirects user back to after authentication attempt.

properties.name: spotify.scopes
properties.description: Spotify scopes required from user during authentication.

properties.name: jwt.secret-key
properties.description: Secret Key used do sign JWT.

properties.name: webapp.successful-login-handler-url
properties.description: Front-end application's URL that user is redirected to from backend after successful authentication.
